review.comment:
My experience consisted of me explaining what I wanted, being told it could be done with 5-10 revisions. After first rough draft it was not what I explained but what he envisioned. I met up with him at his office and sat beside him to point out “play by play” what I wanted. Once we were close to what I wanted I was told my design looked dumb. I was like that’s fine but I paid you to digitize “my design”, just do it. Upon my next check up on his progress was told my 10 revisions were up. My response was ok just send over and I’ll have someone else complete it. Obviously it was nothing I could do since I already paid. It’s 85% complete.
Professionalism is lacking and communication is iffy.
Again, my experience.
